Вот как мне описать игру, которая была создана для людей, которые уже начали разбирать по кирпичикам фирму, которая задерживает выход своей знаменитой игры под цифрой три...ОДНАКО!!!

ОЦЕНИМ:

1. Игру озвучили на русском...
2. Не стандартный проект...
3. Есть кооперативное прохождение...
4. Много головоломок...

ЗАВАЛИМ:

1. Это называют игрой года...ХА-ХА-ХА!!!

ИТОГО:

Совершенно не цепляет, а с другом можно даже поругать эту отрыжку. За что её любить...? Плюс совсем не стоит своих денег, хотя признаюсь, что иногда забавляет и удиляет...ИНОГДА!!!

Я запустил её, рассчитывая провести вечер просто разгадывая головоломки. А выключил с таким невероятным чувством духовного просветления, экстаза и вообще наслаждения, с каким не заканчивал, пожалуй, ни одну игру за последние лет шесть, а то и больше. Этот сюжет, персонажи... Эта концовка. Просто невероятно, как разработчики смогли так улучшить вторую часть. Мало того, послевкусие у всего этого тоже отменное. Я уже полчаса не могу отойти от этих ощущений. Мне откровенно стыдно, что я не играл в неё раньше. Может быть тогда в свое время та же To the Moon не стала бы для меня таким уж откровением.
Geiles Spiel für leute die eine art puzzel spiele oder Denkspiele mögen dass Perfekte Spiel. Ist sein Geld aufjedenfall wert.

Portal est la licence qui m'a donné goût pour les puzzle-games. Une réalisation efficace et soignée, des salles de test de plus tordues les unes que les autres qui nous baladent dans un immense centre/sous-terrain/labyrinthique abandonné. C'est un jeu ambitieux et un incontournable du genre qui mélange réflexion et humour à la perfection.
Durée de vie quasi-illimitée tant qu'on essaie de runner et aussi grâce aux salles de test de la communauté. 
C'est un coup de coeur dont je ne me lasse pas de rejouer.
This game has good graphics, it's funny, it amkes your mind work, and has a great story. Totally worth every penny.

Stating that Portal 2 is one of the best games ever 7 years after it's release might be a bit superfluous, because almost all will be well aware of this "fact". But still, the humor, the beautfully animated environments and the great puzzles require another "thumbs up" I guess. Nitpicking: moving around in the Source engine feels a bit like floating, but this has been the case in all Source games. Besides this minor point, game is well near perfect.
I LOVE this game! It is very humorus and it always made me lauph, both times I played it! I REALLY want portal 3 to come out! What's the holdup, valve?

Is it possible for me to criticize a game this great for being too long?  Is there such a thing as too much awesome?  It would seem wrong, though, to harp on the sequel for stretching the concept a little too thin after everyone said the original was too short.  The game is divided into distinct sections, however, and each section introduces a new twist on the concepts.  There's also a more developed story that keeps you playing in order to find out what happens next.
The one thing I'll say for certain is the environments.  The first game had very simple, sterile chambers, while this one has debris and plants, painted areas and catwalks all over the place.  This makes it look a lot more realistic, but gets in the way of the simplicity of seeing where you can put portals or not.  In fact, a lot of the times you get stuck will just be a problem of observation, rather than puzzle solving.  Once you spot that out-of-the-way place that can hold a portal, the solution becomes much more obvious.
I can't say which one is better. They're different games, but both very much worth playing.

Компания Valve, дествительно постаралась, сделав очередной шедевр:
+
1)Графика и физика стала еще лучше и красивее
2)Сюжет более интересный, чем в первой части и он дается дозированно
3)Атмосферность игры повысилась в связи с тем что некоторые уровни стали огромными
4)Возросло количество юмора
5)Испытания стали немного сложнее
6)Три вида геля добавили игре интерес
-
1)Очень разочаровало что в игре нет возможности просмотреть достижения 
2)Из-за улучшения физики и графики компьютер долго загружал уровни 
и долго грузил сохраниния (но это виноват уже комп)

Portal 2 es una maravilla de juego.

Para empezar no dudes en comprarlo ya sea en oferta o no, es de ley tenerlo en tu biblioteca. 

Si comparamos Portal 2 con el primer Portal, la verdad es que te quedas con la boca abierta. Mejoraron demasiado el juego y le añadieron complementos a la historia que la hicieron volverse más increible e interesante de lo que ya era. Los puzzles de verdad que te dejan pensando un buen rato y es lo mejor por que pones a trabajar tu jodido cerebro de como resolverlos, algunos puzzles parecen que son imposibles pero no, todos tienen su solución y hay que pensarle. 

El juego es largo y si no te es suficiente, puedes ir a WorkShop y descargar más desafios.
Puedes jugar en cooperativo que también es un muy bueno y para mi lo mejor, es crear tus propios mapas y subirlos a la comunidad para que otros jugadores lo prueben.

10/10
Прикольная игра логическая

The first game in this series completely blew my mind. This game does a great job of keeping the same awesome vibe as that, while adding new concepts. There were more characters this time around, and I think that really helped with keeping you sucked in to see what happens next! The puzzles, in my opinion, were more difficult than in the first Portal. I think that was a good thing! This game was definitely longer as well, which is also good. I would recommend this game to anyone that hasn't played it, for sure! However, I would personally suggest playing the first Portal before this one. The first game does a better job of introducing you to how the portals work (which is something it does take a bit to get used to).

I have finished this two games in 1 week and I must admit I am feeling bad that there are no more to play! I actually downloaded the modded Portal Prelude just to have some additional fun and continue playing because this was such a fun time that I am missing it now.

I really can't believe that I played this game only now and not when it was released!

For me this is, and will be for a long while, my number 1 game.

Thank Valve for creating these two masterpiece of work!

I recommend this game for those who enjoy Comedy, FPS, and Puzzle like games. Being the sequel to Portal, this game is much more difficult and even has a co-op mode. The game is great and I had no issues with it.

Story: After destroying Glados from Portal 1, you wake up in a room which acts like a prison. You make a friend who accompanies you throughout the game until a particular point. You find out more about who Glados is, who originally created the whole place, and more about your character.

I've always been interested in this sequel. Even if it's too late, I've just finished te bundle, total 12-15 hours of single story mode. In a word that game is phenomenal. Perfect storyline, hilarious characters, high-tech portal gun and of course a cake.

I would definitely recommend this masterpiece. But first, you must play the first one, not compulsory but that's much better in order to follow the storyline. 

The cake is a lie!!

10/10

Simply amazing. Everyone should play it through at least once. A great puzzle game with an interesting and somewhat dark story. 

[b]GAMEPLAY[/b]
Gameplay-wise it's a first person shooter, what you shoot is not bullets though, it's portals. You'll be solving all sorts of puzzles using these portals. The puzzles are quite varied in terms of design and difficulty. In addition to the single player, there is also a coop mode so you can play with a friend both locally and online.

[b]STORY[/b]
The story is pretty interesting with great and memorable characters that other games can only envy. It'll leave you wanting more.

[b]REPLAYABILITY[/b]
The amazing thing is that you can make your own test chambers or download chambers made by others from the Steam Workshop and there's tons to choose from. You can keep on playing the game for several hours even after completing the single player and coop campaign.
